summary: A website with a link sharing feature, including a Copy Link button and social share options (WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter). Share button placed in a visible location.

existing_features.title: Add a Link Share component that allows users to copy the current page URL to their clipboard via a 'Copy Link' button, with visual confirmation feedback (e.g., tooltip or button text change) after copying.
Add social share buttons for WhatsApp, Facebook, and Twitter/X that open the respective share dialogs in a new tab with the current page URL pre-filled as the shared link.
Place the Link Share component (Copy Link + social share buttons) in a prominent, visible location such as the site header or a floating share bar so it is accessible from any page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add link sharing feature with Copy Link button and social share options (WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter)
